page.title: 07POLITICS
page.content: In the May,1985, County Council elections, the S.D.P. candidate, M.Collins,defeated K.Ball (Tory) in the East Ward, East Grinstead election.The latter had held the seat for 12 years.The local S.D.P.area party has only been formed for 4 years.For the recent election they adopted the slogan "Enough is Enough". Mrs. Collins found that the main local worry was the effect of govt. spending cuts. The two main issues were the declining conditions of the roads and pavements and the undermining of standards in education from declining resources-financial and material. Another concern was the lack of choice of primary schools for parents.
